headline.main: BRITISH SEEK DESTROYERS; Urgent Need for More Craft to Guard Atlantic Cited in London

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 2 -- Britain was said reliably tonight to be urgently seeking additional United States destroyers for convoy duty and to use as anti-submarine patrols on her transatlantic lifelines.
abstract: London repts Amb Halifax seeks destroyers
snippet: LONDON, Jan. 2 -- Britain was said reliably tonight to be urgently seeking additional United States destroyers for convoy duty and to use as anti-submarine patrols on her transatlantic lifelines....
